NFTshopper Release 0.1.5

The NFTshopper extension is an NFT search engine! 

Search any NFT collection:
- On the ethereum blockchain and NFTshopper will display collection information & floor prices for Rarible, LooksRare, and Opensea. The results are NOT FINANCIAL ADVICE.

- On the polygon blockchain and NFTshopper will display collection information & a gallery view.

- On Locatia and NFTshopper will display collection information & a gallery view for the 3d Models. Access artists launch pages and keep up to date with the latest launches by click on the top address suggested in the Locatia view search bar.

This extension is optimized for Opensea and Locatia profiles. Collections that do not have all relevant metadata and/or Opensea profile data may not display properly.
